output_list.reason: The 'reward' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'totalLockedRewardsOf' mapping, allowing a user to overflow their own balanceOf and take control of arbitrary accounts.

The 'transferReward' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'totalLockedRewardsOf' and 'lockedRewardsOf' mappings, allowing a user to overflow their own balanceOf and take control of arbitrary accounts.

The 'unlockReward' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'totalLockedRewardsOf' and 'lockedRewardsOf' mappings, allowing a user to overflow their own balanceOf and take control of arbitrary accounts.
The 'increaseTotalSupply' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'balanceOf' mapping, allowing a user to overflow their own balanceOf and take control of arbitrary accounts.
The 'transfer' function does not have a check to prevent overflow of the 'balanceOf' mapping, allowing a user to overflow their own balanceOf and take control of arbitrary accounts.
